version_description:
What's New:

- Creator Profiles
All creators now have their own profiles as a new tab where they can see all their AR content with the ability to delete them. You can also tap on a creator's name to visit their profile and see their content.

- Design Improvement
The Login page has been redesigned with a more modern UI. We also improved the design in some other places like the Overview, Uploader etc.

If you have feedback or suggestions, please submit a support ticket from within the app. Follow us on Instagram where we share amazing AR videos and exclusive behind the scenes look to what we are doing with AR and LiDAR.

#stayHome
#experienceAR
#stayAwayFromTheFridge

Best,
Krist from Particular AR

What's New:

Early Access Creator Profiles
Now, you can create a Creator profile via Sign In With Apple and start to upload and showcase your AR creations and experiences. No need to get invited! This feature will be free in early access for a limited time and you’ll be able to create AR frames and share them Particular for free, so hurry up and don’t miss out on this offer.

UI Improvements
We improved the design of the app in some places, improved some of the icons and updated the Add New button design.

If you have feedback or suggestions, please submit a support ticket from within the app. Follow us on Instagram where we share amazing AR videos and exclusive behind the scenes look to what we are doing with AR and LiDAR.

Best,
Krist from Particular AR

What's New:

Sign in with Apple
We added the ability to easily create a Creator profile. You can do this from the Profile & Settings screen and also while you are previewing/trying to upload an AR experience. It’s easy, it’s fast and it’s free. This is a limited time offer so hurry up and don’t miss out!

Changes to Particular
- Added a new Gaming category in the quick filter
- Added supported file types as information for uploaders, currently, you can only share .usdz and .reality files as AR Experiences
- Added file sizes limit up to 10 MB top
- Added a link to join our exclusive Facebook group
- Entering a Username is required now
- Fixed a bug that caused the app to crash
- Fixed Tutorials for AR Experience & AR Animation
- Fixed some other minor bugs

If you have feedback or suggestions, please submit a support ticket from within the app. Follow us on Instagram where we share amazing AR videos and exclusive behind the scenes look to what we are doing with AR and LiDAR.

Best,
Krist from Particular AR

What's New:

Particular Search
Search by name and get results for specific AR experiences, frames, face filters and more.

View Counter
You can now check how many times an AR experience has been viewed. This is perfect if you are a Creator as you will see the community's engagement with your AR content.

Design Improvement
We improved the fonts, alignments and many other minor things that make for a better overall experience.

Bug Fixes
We fixed a couple of bugs that caused a crash for some users among other things.

That's about all. If you want to see a feature or have some feedback, please get in touch from within the app.

Thanks,
Krist from Particular

What’s New:
 Design Changes
We tweaked and improved the design of the app and we also added some more information about what the app can do for you.

Bug Fixes
We fixed a couple of bugs that caused a crash for some users among other things.

That's about all. If you want to see a feature or have some feedback, please get in touch from within the app.

Thanks,
Krist from Particular
